title: Page
description: This schema defines Page. A Page in OpenMetadata represents a customizable page with the collection of Knowledge Panels.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this column name.

personas.description: List of personas that this page belongs to.

domains.description: List of domains that this page belongs to.

panels.description: List of knowledge panels this page is composed of.

layout.description: Layout of the page to describe where each panel is configured and with what size.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.
